section.title: Bug Reporting and Other Feedback
section.para: If skit fails to do what it claims, that is a bug. If it does something unexpected, and you don't like it, that may also be a bug. If it generates ugly or poor-performing DDL that may be a bug.
If you find a bug, we want to hear from you.

section.title: How to file a bug report
What to include in a bug report
section.para: Skit version. A short description of the problem. Any clues you can provide based on your attempts to get around the issue. A means of reproducing the problem (copies of the source xml files, or a pg_dump, without data, of the source database would be very useful).
